thread.title: Roger Goodell ‘really bothered’ by Matt Patricia’s clown shirt, report says
thread.title_full: Roger Goodell ‘really bothered’ by Matt Patricia’s clown shirt, report says

title: Roger Goodell ‘really bothered’ by Matt Patricia’s clown shirt, report says
text: — Nick Emmons TV (@nicknbcboston) February 6, 2017 Matt Patricia rocking our Goodell clown shirt like an absolute legend pic.twitter.com/xQRgLgUb6C — Barstool Sports (@barstoolsports) February 6, 2017 "The T-shirt really bothered [Goodell]," an NFL ownership source told CBS Sports . "The fact that Kraft didn't stop him from wearing that ticked some people off, but did they really think he's going to protect Goodell after all of this?" While the Patriots ownership hasn't publicly spoken out against Goodell, New England fans booed Sunday night as he presented the Patriots with the Lombardi Trophy. According to the CBS Sports report, the Patriots front office will continue to have a rough relationship withthe NFLuntil the league parts ways with general counsel Jeff Pash, who played a key role in the Ted Wells/NFL investigation intoDeflategate. Reblog
